data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Free kick for America in their own half.
Federico Vinas (America) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Azteca.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 4, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to America.
America's Henry Martin has run offside.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 9, Throw-in America.
Rogelio Funes Mori (Monterrey) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fernando Guerrero awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick America.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Corner awarded to America.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monterrey's Jesus Gallardo misses with an attempt on goal.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, America have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Bruno Valdez of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 19, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bruno Valdez.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Valdez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Emanuel Aguilera is the substitute for America.
In the minute 23, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rogelio Funes Mori of Monterrey smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for America in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 25, Fernando Guerrero signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to America's area.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Monterrey have been given a penalty at Estadio Azteca...
In the minute 27, Goal! Monterrey take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Nicolas Sanchez spot-kick..
Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monterrey's half?
Monterrey have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
Roger Martinez for America drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Great finish from Vincent Janssen to give Monterrey a 0-2 lead.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 37, America are coming forward and Luis Reyes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fernando Guerrero awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a America throw-in in Monterrey's half.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to America.
America have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 43, Henry Martin for America is whistled offside.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in America territory.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of America.
In the minute 44, Free kick for America in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for America close to the penalty box.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Mexico City.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick Monterrey.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero awards Monterrey a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Vincent Janssen is booked for the away team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
The home team have replaced Emilio Sanchez with Sergio Diaz. This is the second substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
In the minute 48, In Mexico City Monterrey drive forward through Rogelio Funes Mori. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in America.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of America.
In the minute 53, Sebastian Caceres is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Vincent Janssen in Monterrey has been yellow-carded a second time by Fernando Guerrero and is being sent off.
Sebastian Caceres is back on his feet again.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Azteca.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a first substitution, with Miguel Layun replacing Dorlan Pabon.
Monterrey will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from America.
Roger Martinez of America is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 60, Roger Martinez for America has been booked by Fernando Guerrero and receives a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to Monterrey’s Hugo Gonzalez and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick in a good position for America!
In the minute 62, Hugo Gonzalez is back on the pitch.
In Mexico City America attack through Luis Reyes. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 64, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Roger Martinez (America) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Monterrey drive forward but Rogelio Funes Mori is judged offside.
In the minute 66, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey's Jesus Gallardo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, America's Sebastian Cordova gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to America.
America have been given a penalty...
In the minute 75, Emanuel Aguilera's penalty pulls one back for America at Estadio Azteca.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
America are pushing forward but Sebastian Cordova's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
America make their third substitution with Alonso Escoboza replacing Luis Reyes.
Matias Kranevitter is replacing Carlos Rodriguez for Monterrey at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Jesus Gallardo with Maximiliano Meza.
Ruben Gonzalez is replacing Santiago Caseres for the home team.
Monterrey have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Goal! Monterrey extend their lead to 1-3 through Maximiliano Meza.
Sebastian Vegas with an assist there.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 85, Monterrey to take a throw-in in America territory.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Miguel Herrera is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Azteca with Giovani Dos Santos replacing Federico Vinas.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 88, Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
America needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to America.
Giovani Dos Santos gets his shot on target but fails to score for America.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a fourth substitution, with Angel Zapata replacing Celso Ortiz.
Shayr Gonzalez is on a sub for Rogelio Funes Mori for Monterrey.
Shayr Gonzalez (Monterrey) has been shown a straight red card by referee Fernando Guerrero.
